trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: En utlösaråtgärd som börjar en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> och distribuerar dess animeringar till deras målobjekt och egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Använda en BeginStoryboard-åtgärd med ett <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller en <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>gäller animeringar sina Målegenskaper och starta dem.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard börjar en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>genom att anropa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>på dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>referera när den utlöses.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: När du påbörjar en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>på en egenskap som är redan som animeras av en annan <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>-egenskapen för BeginStoryboard avgör hur animeringen fortskrider.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: Pausa, återuppta, stopp eller annars kontroll en Storyboard interaktivt ska kunna pausa, återuppta eller på annat sätt styra en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>som har deklarerats i markeringen interaktivt, måste du ange den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>egenskapen för dess BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan styra den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>med hjälp av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekt (exempelvis <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) ta kontroll över den genom att referera till dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av BeginStoryboard har inte angetts, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>inte kan styras interaktivt när den har startat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [så här: Använd händelseutlösare att styra en Storyboard när den startar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) för mer information.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I koden, kan du använda interaktiva metoderna för den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>klassen för att kontrollera en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>som tillämpades med hjälp av ett BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Vilket är fallet när du använder <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekt, måste du ge BeginStoryboard ett namn för dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>till interaktivt kunna kontrolleras.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger rätt hand av funktionen för att starta en animering klocka i den här storyboard

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##Med den utgöra HandoffBehavior när du använder en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>till en egenskap med hjälp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, eventuella <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekt som tidigare har associerats med den egenskapen som fortsätter att använda systemresurser; tidsinställning systemet tar inte bort klockorna automatiskt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Att undvika prestandaproblem när du använder ett stort antal klockor med <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bör du ta bort programstrukturen klockor från egenskapen animerade när den är klar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Det finns flera sätt att ta bort en klocka: – Om du vill ta bort alla klockor från en egenskap, använder den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden i det animerade objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Anger den egenskap som animeras som den första parametern och `null` som andra.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Detta tar bort alla animering klockor från egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill ta bort en specifik <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>från en lista över klockor, använder du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>att hämta en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>anropa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Detta görs vanligtvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>händelsehanteraren för en clock.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Observera att endast roten klockor kan styras efter en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>-egenskapen för en underordnad klocka returnerar `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Observera också att det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>händelsen inte anropas om effektiva tidslängd klockan är alltid.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I så fall måste användaren bestämma när anropet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Detta är i första hand ett problem för animeringar för objekt som har en lång livstid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: När ett objekt har skräpinsamlats, dess klockor kopplas också och skräpinsamlats.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om klockan objekt [animering och tidsinställning Systemöversikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> uppräkningsvärden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger namnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Genom att namnge den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objekt, den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> kan kontrolleras när den har startats.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: För att kunna pausa, återta eller på annat sätt styra interaktivt en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, egenskapen Name för dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>och använda en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekt som <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>att referera till det här namnet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Om namnet på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>inte anges, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>interaktivt påverkas inte när den har startat; dessutom när den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>avslutas eller anger dess slutperiod, animeringen klockor kasseras.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [så här: Använd händelseutlösare att styra en Storyboard när den startar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) för mer information.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> som den här <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> startar.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> startar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
